"Perfect Strike Intensive Training - VI":
"Boss are you getting used to the coastal area?
There is this Luda Sorcerer that is among
the D-Arkers that appears there. It is a
troublesome creature with dark attacks
both near and far, and I can't do a good
Perfect Strike on it. Are you able to show me
your skills as always?

*Destroy it by using Perfect Strike"

"Io Partner Card

"センパイは海岸エリアには行き慣れて
いるんだろ？
あそこに出現するダーカーに
リューダソーサラーってのがいるよな？
攻撃が遠近共に充実した厄介なやつでさ
うまいようにジャストアタックが出来ない。
いつものようにお手本を見せてくれないか？

※ジャストアタックで撃破する"
